004
005package edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.simulation;
006
007import static edu.wpi.first.units.Units.Radians;
008import static edu.wpi.first.units.Units.RadiansPerSecond;
009import static edu.wpi.first.units.Units.RadiansPerSecondPerSecond;
010
011import edu.wpi.first.math.VecBuilder;
012import edu.wpi.first.math.numbers.N1;
013import edu.wpi.first.math.numbers.N2;
014import edu.wpi.first.math.system.LinearSystem;
015import edu.wpi.first.math.system.plant.DCMotor;
016import edu.wpi.first.math.util.Units;
017import edu.wpi.first.units.measure.Angle;
018import edu.wpi.first.units.measure.AngularAcceleration;
019import edu.wpi.first.units.measure.AngularVelocity;
020import edu.wpi.first.units.measure.MutAngle;
021import edu.wpi.first.units.measure.MutAngularAcceleration;
022import edu.wpi.first.units.measure.MutAngularVelocity;
023import edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.RobotController;
024
025/** Represents a simulated DC motor mechanism. */
026public class DCMotorSim extends LinearSystemSim<N2, N1, N2> {
027  // Gearbox for the DC motor.
028  private final DCMotor m_gearbox;
029
030  // The gearing from the motors to the output.
031  private final double m_gearing;
032
033  // The moment of inertia for the DC motor mechanism.
034  private final double m_jKgMetersSquared;
035
036  // The angle of the system.
037  private final MutAngle m_angle = Radians.mutable(0.0);
038
039  // The angular velocity of the system.
040  private final MutAngularVelocity m_angularVelocity = RadiansPerSecond.mutable(0.0);
041
042  // The angular acceleration of the system.
043  private final MutAngularAcceleration m_angularAcceleration =
044      RadiansPerSecondPerSecond.mutable(0.0);
045
046  /**
047   * Creates a simulated DC motor mechanism.
048   *
049   * @param plant The linear system representing the DC motor. This system can be created with
050   *     {@link edu.wpi.first.math.system.plant.LinearSystemId#createDCMotorSystem(DCMotor, double,
051   *     double)} or {@link
052   *     edu.wpi.first.math.system.plant.LinearSystemId#createDCMotorSystem(double, double)}. If
053   *     {@link edu.wpi.first.math.system.plant.LinearSystemId#createDCMotorSystem(double, double)}
054   *     is used, the distance unit must be radians.
055   * @param gearbox The type of and number of motors in the DC motor gearbox.
056   * @param measurementStdDevs The standard deviations of the measurements. Can be omitted if no
057   *     noise is desired. If present must have 2 elements. The first element is for position. The
058   *     second element is for velocity.
059   */
060  public DCMotorSim(LinearSystem<N2, N1, N2> plant, DCMotor gearbox, double... measurementStdDevs) {
061    super(plant, measurementStdDevs);
062    m_gearbox = gearbox;
063
064    // By theorem 6.10.1 of https://file.tavsys.net/control/controls-engineering-in-frc.pdf,
065    // the DC motor state-space model is:
066    //
067    //   dx/dt = -G²Kₜ/(KᵥRJ)x + (GKₜ)/(RJ)u
068    //   A = -G²Kₜ/(KᵥRJ)
069    //   B = GKₜ/(RJ)
070    //
071    // Solve for G.
072    //
073    //   A/B = -G/Kᵥ
074    //   G = -KᵥA/B
075    //
076    // Solve for J.
077    //
078    //   B = GKₜ/(RJ)
079    //   J = GKₜ/(RB)
080    m_gearing = -gearbox.KvRadPerSecPerVolt * plant.getA(1, 1) / plant.getB(1, 0);
081    m_jKgMetersSquared = m_gearing * gearbox.KtNMPerAmp / (gearbox.rOhms * plant.getB(1, 0));
082  }
083
084  /**
085   * Sets the state of the DC motor.
086   *
087   * @param angularPositionRad The new position in radians.
088   * @param angularVelocityRadPerSec The new velocity in radians per second.
089   */
090  public void setState(double angularPositionRad, double angularVelocityRadPerSec) {
091    setState(VecBuilder.fill(angularPositionRad, angularVelocityRadPerSec));
092  }
093
094  /**
095   * Sets the DC motor's angular position.
096   *
097   * @param angularPositionRad The new position in radians.
098   */
099  public void setAngle(double angularPositionRad) {
100    setState(angularPositionRad, getAngularVelocityRadPerSec());
101  }
102
103  /**
104   * Sets the DC motor's angular velocity.
105   *
106   * @param angularVelocityRadPerSec The new velocity in radians per second.
107   */
108  public void setAngularVelocity(double angularVelocityRadPerSec) {
109    setState(getAngularPositionRad(), angularVelocityRadPerSec);
110  }
111
112  /**
113   * Returns the gear ratio of the DC motor.
114   *
115   * @return the DC motor's gear ratio.
116   */
117  public double getGearing() {
118    return m_gearing;
119  }
120
121  /**
122   * Returns the moment of inertia of the DC motor.
123   *
124   * @return The DC motor's moment of inertia.
125   */
126  public double getJKgMetersSquared() {
127    return m_jKgMetersSquared;
128  }
129
130  /**
131   * Returns the gearbox for the DC motor.
132   *
133   * @return The DC motor's gearbox.
134   */
135  public DCMotor getGearbox() {
136    return m_gearbox;
137  }
138
139  /**
140   * Returns the DC motor's position.
141   *
142   * @return The DC motor's position.
143   */
144  public double getAngularPositionRad() {
145    return getOutput(0);
146  }
147
148  /**
149   * Returns the DC motor's position in rotations.
150   *
151   * @return The DC motor's position in rotations.
152   */
153  public double getAngularPositionRotations() {
154    return Units.radiansToRotations(getAngularPositionRad());
155  }
156
157  /**
158   * Returns the DC motor's position.
159   *
160   * @return The DC motor's position
161   */
162  public Angle getAngularPosition() {
163    m_angle.mut_setMagnitude(getAngularPositionRad());
164    return m_angle;
165  }
166
167  /**
168   * Returns the DC motor's velocity.
169   *
170   * @return The DC motor's velocity.
171   */
172  public double getAngularVelocityRadPerSec() {
173    return getOutput(1);
174  }
175
176  /**
177   * Returns the DC motor's velocity in RPM.
178   *
179   * @return The DC motor's velocity in RPM.
180   */
181  public double getAngularVelocityRPM() {
182    return Units.radiansPerSecondToRotationsPerMinute(getAngularVelocityRadPerSec());
183  }
184
185  /**
186   * Returns the DC motor's velocity.
187   *
188   * @return The DC motor's velocity
189   */
190  public AngularVelocity getAngularVelocity() {
191    m_angularVelocity.mut_setMagnitude(getAngularVelocityRadPerSec());
192    return m_angularVelocity;
193  }
194
195  /**
196   * Returns the DC motor's acceleration in Radians Per Second Squared.
197   *
198   * @return The DC motor's acceleration in Radians Per Second Squared.
199   */
200  public double getAngularAccelerationRadPerSecSq() {
201    var acceleration = (m_plant.getA().times(m_x)).plus(m_plant.getB().times(m_u));
202    return acceleration.get(0, 0);
203  }
204
205  /**
206   * Returns the DC motor's acceleration.
207   *
208   * @return The DC motor's acceleration.
209   */
210  public AngularAcceleration getAngularAcceleration() {
211    m_angularAcceleration.mut_setMagnitude(getAngularAccelerationRadPerSecSq());
212    return m_angularAcceleration;
213  }
214
215  /**
216   * Returns the DC motor's torque in Newton-Meters.
217   *
218   * @return The DC motor's torque in Newton-Meters.
219   */
220  public double getTorqueNewtonMeters() {
221    return getAngularAccelerationRadPerSecSq() * m_jKgMetersSquared;
222  }
223
224  /**
225   * Returns the DC motor's current draw.
226   *
227   * @return The DC motor's current draw.
228   */
229  public double getCurrentDrawAmps() {
230    // I = V / R - omega / (Kv * R)
231    // Reductions are output over input, so a reduction of 2:1 means the motor is spinning
232    // 2x faster than the output
233    return m_gearbox.getCurrent(m_x.get(1, 0) * m_gearing, m_u.get(0, 0))
234        * Math.signum(m_u.get(0, 0));
235  }
236
237  /**
238   * Gets the input voltage for the DC motor.
239   *
240   * @return The DC motor's input voltage.
241   */
242  public double getInputVoltage() {
243    return getInput(0);
244  }
245
246  /**
247   * Sets the input voltage for the DC motor.
248   *
249   * @param volts The input voltage.
250   */
251  public void setInputVoltage(double volts) {
252    setInput(volts);
253    clampInput(RobotController.getBatteryVoltage());
254  }
255}
